servhead: A unique partner at every stage of your project.
servtext: We operate across the entire real estate cycle: Development, Transaction, Management and Project Monitoring.
sotext: We have a diversified portfolio of properties in Cameroon's major cities. Whether you're looking to rent a modern office for your business, a comfortable family or personal apartment, or purchase a villa, our selection of carefully maintained properties offers solutions suited to all profiles and budgets.
soone: Rental - Business Real Estate and Housing
sotwo: Get immediate access to quality professional and residential spaces in Cameroon's most sought-after areas, without the constraints of purchasing.
sothree: Customized portfolio: We present properties that truly match your criteria.
sofour: Accompanied visits: We guide you and answer all your on-site questions.
sofive: Ready documents: Leases, condition reports and practical guide, all ready to sign.
sosix: Permanent support: One contact person, available throughout the rental period.
soeight: Active marketing of properties from our portfolio, off-plan sales (VEFA) and building transfers.
sonine: Ready technical file: Plans, areas, titles and certificates — everything clear and available.
soten: Land valuation: Compared prices, appreciation projection and expected profitability.
soeleven: Legal support: We help you manage notarial procedures and secure the property.
sttext: We mobilize our market expertise and a national network of agents to support acquisitions, sales and rentals. Single point of contact, reliable estimates, transparency and personalized financial, legal and tax support to connect buyers and sellers throughout the country.
sttwo: Sourcing and analysis to find the ideal property that perfectly matches your needs, budget and long-term aspirations.
stthree: Discovery session: We discuss your needs, budget and objectives in detail.
stfour: Targeted search: We source the best opportunities through our network and partners.
stfive: Evaluation report: For each property, we clearly analyze strengths, risks and compliance.
stsix: Negotiation: We defend your interests to obtain the best conditions and price.
stseven: Final coordination: We help you manage everything up to signing (notary, bank, insurance).
stnine: Enhance and market your property effectively to get the best price in the shortest time
stten: Professional estimate: We value your property according to the market, its characteristics and trends.
steleven: Enhancement: We suggest simple actions (minor work, home staging) to increase attractiveness.
sttwelve: Multi-channel marketing: HD photos, 360° tour, sales text and targeted distribution.
stthirteen: Qualified visits: We organize and accompany visits with pre-selected buyers.
stfourteen: Supported closing: We negotiate and coordinate all procedures up to signing.
stsixteen: Quickly connect owners and qualified tenants with a transparent and secure process that protects both parties' interests.
stseventeen: For owners: Professional listing distribution, rigorous pre-selection, solvency verification and compliant lease drafting.
steighteen: For tenants: Access to verified properties, help assembling the file and clear explanation of conditions.
stnineteen: Professional condition reports: Photos and complete report on entry and exit to avoid disputes.
sttwenty: Legal advice: We clarify rights and obligations under Cameroonian law.
sthtext: Entrust us with complete management of your property portfolio and enjoy regular income without administrative constraints. SCI Hibiscus handles tenant search, rent collection, maintenance, charge payments and administrative representation for your peace of mind.
sthtwo: Quickly find serious and solvent tenants to minimize vacancy periods and secure your rental income.
sthfour: Visit organization and complete tenant file.
sthseven: Delegate all administrative tasks related to your rental property for hassle-free management.
stheight: Secure contracts: We draft compliant and protective leases.
sthnine: Collected rents: Monthly collection, reminders and management of unpaid rents.
sthten: Managed charges: Payment of water, electricity, taxes and co-ownership charges.
stheleven: Clear reporting: Complete periodic statement of operations and actions.
sftext: We provide project management and technical assistance, from sketch to key handover: complete studies (APS/APD), permits, tender documents, contractor coordination, rigorous site monitoring and reception, prioritizing local, sustainable materials adapted to Cameroon's climate.
sftwo: Delegate complete responsibility for designing and executing your project to us with our comprehensive project management service, from initial idea to final delivery.
sfthree: Complete architectural studies: We translate your vision into 2D/3D sketches, then carry out the preliminary project (preliminary plans, areas, layout, estimate) and detailed project (final plans, materials, specifications), then compile and follow up on building permit.
sffour: Specialized technical studies: We perform structural calculations and size foundations according to soil; design networks (electricity, plumbing, air conditioning); integrate sustainable energy solutions and recommend high-performance local materials adapted to the climate.
sffive: Work contract preparation: We prepare complete tender documents (execution plans, specifications, quantities), consult and compare qualified companies, verify references and offers, negotiate contracts and set optimized execution schedule.
sfsix: Rigorous work monitoring: We coordinate all trades, ensure continuous quality control with verifications and photo evidence, manage schedule and budget, produce transparent reporting and organize detailed weekly meetings with follow-up.
sfseven: Reception operation assistance: We organize provisional reception, write the list of reservations, follow their resolution until final reception, assist with operations and hand over complete file (plans, manuals, warranties, certificates).
sfnine: Benefit from our technical expertise and strategic advice without delegating complete control of your project, ideal if you want to maintain control while relying on professionals.
sften: Strategic advice and validation: We clarify your program, validate architectural and technical choices, arbitrate options and ensure overall project consistency.
sfeleven: Company offer analysis: We verify quote completeness, detect anomalies or omissions, compare technical and financial offers, and provide clear, reasoned recommendations to facilitate your decision.
sftwelve: Spot technical control: We intervene at key stages (foundations, structure, finishes), check compliance, identify defects and propose immediate priority corrective actions and implementation methods.
sfthirteen: Administrative and legal support: We assist with permits and authorizations, verify contracts before signing, provide basic legal advice and representation at official meetings.
sffourteen: Budget optimization: We identify possible savings, validate service/price consistency, propose cost control levers, preventive alerts and regular financial monitoring.
